about_the_game:
Welcome to InController!

A couch co-op within a couch co-op!
In this demo, grab a friend or 3. This is 4 player action at its finest!
Included in this demo is the mini game, Who Gave that Duck a Gun?
Work with your teammate to control the on screen controller which controls your teams character. Confused yet?
Grab the gun and the bullet and shot the other players character to win. Sounds easy, right?
It is, until they cross onto your controller and start pressing your buttons!

To play, you need 4 connected controllers. Upon starting, each player should select a character and then sit on the couch with their teammate. Once all 4 players are sitting on a couch (2 on each couch), the game will start.

If you experience any issues with the game, please email futurefossilgames@gmail.com and I will help in any way I can!
